// These are generic base actors for monsters, miscellaneous characters,
// and other actors that require them for one reason or another. These
// bases can generally be used for most ReMixer monsters without modifiying
// them too much.

// Monster bases
// The monsters are split into 8 possible types with 5 sizes, or 40 total bases,
// with extra bases as well

// Humanoid enemies
// Zombiemen, Nitrogoloms, Acolytes, etc.

// Tiny size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidTiny
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 256
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop			
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking		
			TNT1 A 5
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop	
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedMan",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,0)		
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeath")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("DisintEffectTiny",0,10)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Death.Nuke:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking		
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("WTNukeDeathTiny")
			"####" "#################" 3 A_Fadeout(0.05)
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop	
		Death.HLLaser:
		Death.HLExplosive:
		Death.HLRPGExplosive:	
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20, "Death.FreemanGibs")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.HLEgon:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			wait

			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:

			wait

		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath
		Death.RTCWVenomBullet:

			//Goto Death

			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/MaleScream",CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20, "UnrealXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.UnrealExtreme:
		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:
		UnrealXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath
		Death.RTCWVenomBullet:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

			//"####" "#" 5
			//"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RTCW_DeathGibberKeep",1,1)
			//Goto Death
			//"####" "#" 5
			//Goto Death		
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
		RTCWXDeath2:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop

		Death.Q3Energy:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20,"XDeath.Q3Explosive")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait

		XDeath.Q3Explosive:

			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

			Stop			
	}

			wait
		Death.Hexen2Extreme:

		XDeathForDemoness:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("Hexen2/Gib", CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)  
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Hexen2GibSpawnerColor",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/MaleScream",CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			wait

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid

			Stop

            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

	{

			Loop

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Demonic enemies //
// Most of the Doom roster, some Shadow Warrior ReMixer enemies, etc.

// Tiny size

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)

            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Small size
Actor SamsaraMonsterDemonicSmall
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 256
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:		
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:

			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.UnrealExtreme:
		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:
		UnrealXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericCreatureGibSpawner", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath
		Death.RTCWVenomBullet:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

			//"####" "#" 5
			//"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RTCW_DeathGibberKeep",1,1)
			//Goto Death
			//"####" "#" 5
			//Goto Death		
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterDemonicMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255

		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:

			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop

		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking

            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.Hexen2Fire:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"XDeathForDemoness")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.Hexen2Extreme:
		Death.Hexen2ElectricExtreme:
		XDeathForDemoness:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("Hexen2/Gib", CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)  
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Hexen2GibSpawnerColor",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:

			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

{

	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255

    +NOICEDEATH

	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterAlienMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 196
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:

			wait

		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath

			//"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RTCW_DeathGibberKeep",1,1)
			//Goto Death
			//"####" "#" 5
			//Goto Death		
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")

			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterAlienLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")

			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "ElectricBolt", 2.0
	DamageFactor "PoisonBolt", 0.5
	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0
	DamageFactor "Tesla", 2.0
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 128
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")

		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")

			wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

		DeusXDeath:

			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

{

	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255

	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterBeastMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 196
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking	
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathSmall")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterBeastLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 128
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid

		DeusXDeath:

		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

	}

            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop			
	}

			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Lost souls, Wolf3D Spectres, enemies disappearing when dying, etc.

			Wait

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)

	}

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")

            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Miscellaneous character bases
// The misc. characters are split into 4 types of either interactive (dynamic)
// or non-interactive (static) characters, for a total of 8 bases

// Humanoid misc. characters
// Duke3D strippers, Blood innocents, etc.
Actor SamsaraMiscCharHumanoidStatic
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")

			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop		
	}
}

Actor SamsaraMiscCharHumanoidDynamic : SwitchableDecoration
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SWHumanGibSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)		
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(218, 2)	
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LoWangDMTaunt1",1)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait	
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/MaleScream",CHAN_5)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop		
	}
}

			Stop

			Stop		
	}

			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"XDeathForDemoness")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Hexen2GibSpawnerColor",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			stop
		Death.GETank:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Goldeneye/Tank/Squish",CHAN_6)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))

			wait

		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")

		Death.DukePlasma:

            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)

            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop		
	}
}

			Loop

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}
}

// Non-bleeding misc. characters
// Similar to Robotic misc. characters, but without the increased damage from certain sources
Actor SamsaraMiscCharNonBleedingStatic
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1

	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255

    +NOICEDEATH
	-COUNTKILL

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DukePlasma:
            "####" "#" 0 A_Stop
            "####" "#" 1 A_NoBlocking
            "####" "#" 0 A_Jump(218,2)
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveToTarget("DukeKillTaunt",1)
            "####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DN64PlasmaDeath")
            "####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("Duke64PlasmaEffectSmall")
            "####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
            "####" "#" 27 A_Scream
            TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
            TNT1 A -1
            Stop
	}

// Dark Side AI bases
// Although these bases would only be used in ReMixer when Jerec kills
// a player while downed, it's more convienent to put the bases here in
// Reincarnation. These are split into 3 bases, one for actors with an
// XDeath state, one without an XDeath state, and those that don't gib
// like the Chex Warrior.
Actor SamsaraMonsterDarkSideAIRegular
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 0.8
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 0.8
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
	PainChance "DoomDamageTypeStunner", 255
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0	
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop			
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking

// Corpse bases
// The corpses are the easiest bases to cover, with only 3
// types to choose from
Actor SamsaraCorpseActorSmall
{
	-SHOOTABLE
	+VULNERABLE
	+ISMONSTER
	-COUNTKILL
	-SOLID
	+NOTARGET
	-FRIENDLY
	+NEVERTARGET
	+SEESDAGGERS
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster

Actor SamsaraCorpseActorMedium : SamsaraCorpseActorSmall
{
	-SHOOTABLE
	+VULNERABLE
	+ISMONSTER
	-COUNTKILL
	-SOLID
	+NOTARGET
	-FRIENDLY
	+NEVERTARGET
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathSmall")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			stop
		Death.Nuke:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("WTNukeDeathSmall")
			"####" "#################" 3 A_Fadeout(0.05)
			stop
		Death.ZorchPistol:
		Death.Zorch:
		Death.ZorchKamikaze:
		Death.PhasingZorch:
		Death.ZorchSpectral:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			stop
	}
}

Actor SamsaraCorpseActorLarge : SamsaraCorpseActorSmall
{

Actor Samsara_BossDeath : Trigger
{
	States
	{
		Pickup:
			TNT1 A 0 A_BossDeath
			Stop
	}
}

Actor Samsara_KillMaster : Trigger
{
	States
	{
		Pickup:
			TNT1 A 0 A_KillMaster
			Stop
	}
}

// Most enemies that need special treatment in order to fully get them working,
// have their own bases in ReincarnationMonsterBases.txt, but there are a few that
// might need to have their states manually placed due to possible conflicts with
// certain games or otherwise creating problems; if the monster bases are updated,
// make sure that the needed states are either updated or correctly copied over

//-----------------------
// Reincarnation Enemies:
//-----------------------

// Hacx
// Android - SamsaraMonsterRoboticMedium

// Harmony
// Echidna - SamsaraMonsterBeastHuge

// REKKR: Sunken Land
// Former King - SamsaraMonsterDemonicHuge
// Gardien - SamsaraMonsterSkeletonHuge

// Other
// AnubisWarriorReinc - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// StrifePeasant - SamsaraMiscCharHumanoidStatic
// ZDoom Scripted Marine - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium

//-----------------
// ReMixer Enemies:
//-----------------

// Marathon
// Due to the way most of the monsters' XDeath states
// are structured, they'll need to be manually updated
// for nearly all of them.

// Half Life
// HECU Sarge - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium

// Redneck Rampage
// Daisy and Doyle - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
